text:
- We help customers with
migration, modernization, security,

and we've got a focus
now on carbon reduction.

We signed a strategic
collaborative agreement with AWS,

which then really put us
into a growth mode with them.

As technology gets utilized
by businesses more and more,

we've continued to need
more and more of the talent
to come in and meet those needs.
So we went forward with a strategy
to train people from diverse backgrounds
and give them opportunities to come in

and to grow themselves,
provide value for themselves,
provide value for our customers.

We established a talent
academy where we bring in
20 people at a time in a cohort,
and we would start them from ground zero
with foundational capabilities
for different cloud skill sets.
When they come from the six weeks
and then into that next phase

before they actually start
delivering for customers.

We have a broad global
reach with our program.
We've done cohorts in India,
in Central Europe,
in Northern Europe,
London, and North America.
These programs are really

moving the needle
forward for our business,

for our people as we continue
to incrementally grow.
The training and certification programs
help our people get our customers

to a most efficient solution
when we're entering the door

with that level of
experience and capability.
